column.name: parameter_sql
column.value: select r.id as report_id, r.report_name, r.report_type, r.report_subtype, r.report_category, rp.id as parameter_id, rp.report_parameter_name, p.parameter_name from stretchy_report r left join stretchy_report_parameter rp on rp.report_id = r.id left join stretchy_parameter p on p.id = rp.parameter_id where r.report_category = '${reportCategory}' and r.use_report is true and r.self_service_user_report = ${isSelfServiceUser} and exists (select 'f' from m_appuser_role ur join m_role rr on rr.id = ur.role_id join m_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = rr.id join m_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.appuser_id = ${currentUserId} and (p.code in ('ALL_FUNCTIONS_READ', 'ALL_FUNCTIONS') or p.code = concat('READ','_', r.report_name))) order by r.report_category, r.report_name, rp.id
